data.title: Patient Reviews of Sanford Dental Excellence
data.meta_description: Read real reviews from our patients at Sanford Dental Excellence. Your trusted experts in cosmetic and restorative dentistry.
data.text:
Patient Reviews

Real Patient Reviews

Scroll down to see our wonderful patient reviews that we receive from our great patients at Sanford Dental Excellence!

★★★★★

My dad highly recommended this office. His praise wasn't overstated! The staff is wonderful - everyone in the office is cheerful and friendly and welcoming. The technology is state of the art and the office is spotless. I saw Dr. Mitrogogos and he was excellent. First visit - includes exam and X-rays - was free! And because my dad referred me, he gets a $50 credit on his account and I received a $50 credit too. Highly recommend!!

Elisa Muschler

★★★★★

If you are looking to find an office of professionals, that are caring, personable, down to earth, who take their time and explain in a way that is not only in a caring understandable way, they make you feel at ease through it all! If this sounds amazing, then look no further, you have found it! Thanks to the entire staff for making something I have been dreading into something I am at ease to begin.

Ann Mccallister

★★★★★

I recently had a consult for a bottom bridge with implants. It is a very complex situation. I was so impressed with Dr. Mitrogogos and the staff I will definitely be a patient for all my dental needs from now on. He calmed my fears and explained the procedures needed To go forward.

Edward Sheehsn

★★★★★

This is by far the BEST dental office. They are so understanding and helpful. I was always scared of the dentist until I found them. They make you feel so welcome and they really care about you!

Angela Brown

★★★★★

Can't say enough good things about this team, just amazing!!

Benjamin Clark

★★★★★

BEST DENTIST, GREAT STAFF If you need dental work, look no more, Sanford Dental is the very best.

Mona Burke

★★★★★

Great dentist 🦷 & crew they really care about your dental hygiene, I’ve had a couple of implants added to my gums and I’m very happy with the results I highly recommend Dr.Mitrogogos 👍

Rebecca Pacheco

★★★★★

From the moment I walked in the door at Sanford Dental location , I was made to feel welcome and well cared for. I couldn't have asked for a better team and compassionate care was over the top . I trust this crew implicitly with my dental needs .

Donald Macauley

★★★★★

I love this office! This is absolutely the most comfortable I have EVER felt in a dentist office! The doctor and all of the staff are so caring. The best!!

Wendy Wager

★★★★★

In addition to receiving stellar service, competence and outcomes, a dental appointment here is like visiting favorite relatives or friends. They show genuine concern for your well-being, put you right at ease and are always ready to share some laughs ( and not from nitrous oxide!).

Bertie Barber

★★★★★

I love this dental office.I highly recommend them. They are all extremely kind and caring. They do excellent work.

Darlene Archer

★★★★★

The best dental office I have ever been to. Dr. M and his entire staff are awesome 🤩. They have gone above and beyond to take care of me. I’m so happy with everyone. I can’t say enough good about them.

Debbie Bissland

★★★★★

This practice lives up to it's name. The doctor and his staff are beyond helpful . They make you feel comfortable with whatever procedures you are about to have. His staff helps you with whatever issues may come up. They go the extra mile, which is hard to find these days. I only wish that I had found Dental Excellence sooner. I have recommended this office to anyone that is looking for a dentist, a great dentist who really cares.

Karen Miller

★★★★★

Dr. Mitrogogos took over the practice and raised the bar even higher. They do everything possible to make going to the dentist a pleasant experience. They make other dentists seem like they are still operating in the civil war era. Everything, and I mean EVERYTHING, is done with such care and professionalism that I just can't think of anything that would make it better until someone invents a magic wand that gives the patient perfect teeth with one wave over their head.

Jim Grupe

★★★★★

Excellent and caring dental practice. My hygienist was very thorough and gentle. Would highly recommend this practice if anyone has a fear of dental procedures. You are cared for as a person not just a patient. Friendly and immaculate office. Thank you so much!

Jennifer Barbarow

★★★★★

All the fear of going to the dentist is over once you go to this DR. He is amazing and has a staff that is outstanding! These guys are the best!

Cassandra Stoops

★★★★★

Thank you for the birthday wish. It sure meant alot.. you guys are great.

Lorraine Adams

★★★★★

I AM EXTREMELY SATISFIED WITH THE IMPLANT WORK I HAD DONE WITH THIS OFFICE SANFORD DENTAL EXCELLENCE AND DR.GEORGE MITROGOGOS IS AWESOME GREAT JOB!!! I WOULD DEFINITELY RECOMMEND THIS OFFICE,THANK YOU.

Rebecca Pacheco-Rogers

★★★★★

The BEST dental office. They care about you their patients!

Peggy Bennett

★★★★★

Really good Dr. and staff. I'm so happy that I found this dentist, I have anxiety every time I visit. But he and his staff helped make me comfortable and the sedation is great. Love this office.

Karen Miller

★★★★★

I have not stopped smiling since I came to Sanford Dental. I do not have dental problems anymore. No pain, great dental health and continuous great service and care. The talents and compassion of this team of professionals are exceptional. Thank you all for giving me this healthy smile.

Barbara Tanzer

★★★★★

I hadn't been to a dentist in MANY years because of fear from bad dental experiences. From the moment I walked in the door the staff made me feel comfortable. Tracey and Stephanie were wonderful and patient with me. Dr. Mitrogogos was nonjudgmental and presented a reasonable dental plan. I would highly recommend this office.

Bonnie Boehlke

★★★★★

Great experience, Dr George and his staff are over caring about you and your treatment. Best dentist ever, I use to be scared to death of dentist until I started going to Sanford dental. So if you are in need of a dentist, look no more go to Sanford Dental, best care ever. Thank you all for taking such good care of me

Mona Burke

★★★★★

Noel is my Hygienist. She's always awesome and Is a professional at her job. Staff is great and so is the doctor. They make you feel like family. 👍

Thomas Inglima

★★★★★

Dr. M and his staff are amazing. He always listens to me and my concerns. His staff is wonderful. The best dental team I have ever been to. If you want a dentist with a caring staff Dental Excellence is the place to go.

Charlotte Roberts

★★★★★

Most thorough, thoughtful and detailed exam ever. Technology like no one, patience, clarity and kindness, gave warm feeling of being In good hands. This was beyond expectations, there should be a line like Chick Fil A to see these guys, they are that good...

Eddie Torres

★★★★★

After searching almost every dentist from Orlando to Tampa, and reading the reviews for Dr. Mitrogogos I had my consultation appt, last week. I am confident and impressed by his dental knowledge. Dr Mitrogogs planning for my complicated treatment, I am going forward with his recommendations to bring back my facial features with dental procedures.

Phyllis Byers

★★★★★

The staff make me feel like I am a valuable and important patient/ customer. I appreciate how knowledgeable they all are in each of their expertise positions.They work together as a well organized team. I would gladly recommend Dental Excellence to anyone who needs talented/ knowledgeable dental work done.

Denise Carpenter

★★★★★

My wife and I moved to Florida the January before the Covid outbreak. We needed new doctors and dentists. After extensive research, she opted for Sanford Dental Excellence. She chose wisely. This is the most upbeat professional staff. Thank you!

Randolph Horner

★★★★★

One cannot improve upon perfection and this practice is exactly that. Dr. Mitrogogos is an outstanding dentist and he has surrounded himself with competent, professional and courteous staff. My wife and I have been patients at this practice for years and will continue into the future.

Benny Crosby

★★★★★

I started working with Sanford Dental Excellence in 2016. It’s been an extensive process but with the compassion from staff members, friendliness from my patient care specialist and the professionalism and skills from Dr. Mitrogogos and his dental hygienists, what started as a stressful and scary situation is now manageable. With each visit and procedures explained in great detail and no question left unanswered, my anxiety and fear was melted away. You can not put a price on feeling comfortable as a patient. I highly recommend Sanford Dental Excellence. They changed my life and gave me my smile back!

Lauren Clauss

★★★★★

I can't say enough good things about this dental practice. The doctor was meticulous and very precise in his approach to my treatment as were his assistants. The entire staff is friendly and professional. They just seem like nice people who like their job. I/we completed all the work I needed done (which was a lot) and I couldn't be more pleased with the end result. I kind of miss not seeing these nice people as often as I did during my treatment time. Never thought I'd say that about a dental office.

Linda Norvig

★★★★★

I have been lucky enough to find Dr M over a year ago. He is awesome and really seems to care. I have the ultimate dentist phobia and it is extremely difficult for me to go even for a simple cleaning. The last time I was in the office I didn't have a great experience as I was leaving. That leads me to not going back for a long time. Despite how great Dr M is. Well, fast forward to this past Tuesday. I ahd to go back to have a crown put back on. As always I was panicking and completely scared. But I managed to get in there and the staff were wonderful. But, I had the luck of having Brandy as the lady helping me with the crown refit. She made me feel so much better and didn't seem the least bit put off or upset by my very extreme fears. They truly are the best.

Danielle whitlow

★★★★★

This is the best dentist office. When my dentist retired I found Dr. George and he and his staff are wonderful. I no longer have a fear of going to the dentist.

Ray Santmyers

★★★★★

Sanford Dental is the only place I recommend when asked. Staff keeps you comfortable thru every step of the way and are very knowledgeable. From root canal to extractions; from fillings to cleanings, they're the only folks I trust with my grill!

Lisa Deneweth

★★★★★

Excellent Dentist and entire staff!! Definitely left there everytime smiling.

Francine Klimkowski

★★★★★

Just had my semiannual cleaning with Carter, as usual very pleasant and professional. Thanks again Carter, great job👍

Andre Dumont

★★★★★

The ENTIRE staff are friendly, knowledgeable, polite and VERY good at making me feel comfortable for some of my procedures. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!

David Farmer

★★★★★

I had another pleasant visit with Dr. Mitrogogos and his staff yesterday 7/7/20. I’m in their office quite often and watch how professional and conscientious they are in handling every situation. I’d refer anybody 100%!

Siegrid Yebba

★★★★★

Best dental practice I have ever experienced. I had 6 crowns installed, it was painless and they look great. Everyone in the office is so friendly and very professional, they really care about their clients. Dr. Mitrogogos is a wonderful dentist and cares about your comfort and makes sure that you are happy and satisfied with the dental procedure. I am very happy, my crowns look fantastic!

Vivienne Logan

★★★★★

First, Dr M is the best! Always friendly, caring, patient-you never feel rushed. Staff is always above and beyond-great attitude. My husband has had extensive dental work & very satisfied and my recent teeth cleaning was good with a thorough mouth exam which I appreciate very much. Great people, fair pricing, always there for you even during the covid-19. Thank you everyone!

Corinne Estell

★★★★★

Great experience! Best dental experience I have ever had. Friendly staff and emmaculant equipment was unmatched by any other dental experience and would recommend to anyone I know.

Brad Henderson

★★★★★

My dental implants have been all done for a few months now and I have never felt better I am eating anything I want with ease they feel like there my real teeth I’m so amazed with them and they are beautiful if I do say so my self and I do I have smiled so much my cheeks hurt I just can’t get over the professionalisms of the staff from the awesome ladies up front to the dental assistants and to the dentist who stepped in after the first dentists retired and matched them up perfectly with the top if you are looking to get implants Sanford dental Excellence is the place to go trust me I got 9 quotes before I started the process and out of them all Sanford dental blows them out the water all around cleanliness Professionalism and fair pricing .....thank you staff for changing my life for the better and making me more than happy you guys are the best

Jeremy Pennington

★★★★★

I have bad anxiety when it comes to dentists because of prior history. I finally made the call to come to Sanford dental excellence and loved it. As soon as I walked in the doors I was greeted and was comfortable as they explain everything in great detail. They also give you options and really care about you as a patient. I needed MAJOR dental work and in July had my surgery with Dr.M. He is very skilled at what he does and is very compassionate also. I felt no pain at all. They provide quality care with a gentle touch. I would highly recommend them to anyone and have a few family members who will be making their appointment soon. Thank you Dr.M and staff for providing amazing service!

Dana White

★★★★★

Dr. Mitrogogos and his staff are always positive, kind, caring and understanding. I’ve been working with them since August of 2016. Almost all of my teeth were impacted by the iodine radiation treatments I received for Stage III Thyroid Cancer. Those treatments while life saving, severely impacted my teeth leaving me extremely uncomfortable and embarrassed to even smile. Now today, years later, I have my smile back and it’s all in thanks to the dedication and collaboration of the amazing staff! I can never say thank you enough!! From, One Extremely Happy Patient

Lauren Clauss

★★★★★

Sanford Dental is great. Dr George is one of the best dentist I have ever been to. I am one of those people that is scared to death of the dentist, well not anymore, I know that when I sit down in the chair my care will be the best. The staff is so welcoming. I have been under care there for over a year now, if I ever have a issue they are quick to get me in. So if you are looking for a great dentist, call Sanford Dental today. Excellence is the word.

Mona Burke

★★★★★

Best staff ever. Always a great experience.

Suzanne Edwards

★★★★★

Sanford Dental Excellence it’s most top-notch dental office I’ve ever been to. Up-to-date modern equipment very friendly staff excellent doctors. I hadn’t been to the dentist in years due to bad experience that I had. I a friend refer me to this dental office I’m in the process of having dental implants I’ve seen their work first hand excellent!

Peggy Bennett

★★★★★

Excellence is the perfect word for Sanford Dental. I started going here last year and they have been amazing. Dr George is one of the best dentist I’ve ever been to. He always makes sure his patients are comfortable. And his office staff are more than welcoming, and caring as well. If you need dental work, call today. They are truly best of the best here at Sanford Dental excellence

Mona Burke

★★★★★

Look no further you have found your forever provider! I thank you and your office for my confidence and absolute happiness back!

Kathleen Castro

★★★★★

Awesome, extraordinary, dental excellence - not said lightly. Been going to dentists for 60+years and none had this level of precision. For the first time in DECADES all my teeth now fit together properly like when I was a teenager. All this was well worth any slightly higher cost. I recommend highly to everyone who wants dental work done the way you always hoped and wanted but rarely achieve.

Dr. Bruce Vinikas

★★★★★

Sanford Dental WOW!!!!! I am a new patient and I am so happy that I am! From the friendly caring staff to the awesome dentist... and the amazing technology and detailed care given to my first exam!!! Impressive!!!!!! Love you guys!!! Thank you!!

Terri Johnson

★★★★★

There is no way to say enough about Sanford dental! EXCELLENCE is a understatement for this group. Dr George is a great dentist, I was always so scared of dentist, but not anymore, And his staff is just as great. always welcoming anyone that walks in the door! Sanford Dental is still taking great care of me, and I can’t thank them enough! They brought me my smile back. So search no more, they are truly great!

Mona Burke

★★★★★

I highly recommend Dr. Mitrogogos. He is absolutely an amazing dentist. The best I have ever had in my life. It is because of him that I feel confident in my smile after 30 years. His work is beyond impressive! You need to make an appointment to see him. You will not be disappointed!

Carolyn Damato

★★★★★

Dr. M and staff are the best! He is friendly, kind, and informative! He made sure I was comfortable and made sure I never felt any pain. Thanks

Andre Dumont

★★★★★

My dental experience has been awesome with this office and staff. In the past years I’ve had horrible dental experience. My dental implant experience has truly been unbelievable thanks to the entire staff and Dr. I highly recommend sanford dental excellence.

Peggy Bennett

★★★★★

We love everyone in the office. Professional, caring, friendly. I lost a crown over Christmas and Dr M came in and fixed it for me! They are all angels and I would highly recommend them.

Sue Vosburg

★★★★★

Great dentist office. Wouldn't go anywhere else!!

Vance and Charlotte Elswick

★★★★★

The ENTIRE staff are professional and also made me feel at ease throughout my procedures. I HIGHLY recommend Sanford Dental Exelence!

David Farmer

★★★★★

The staff is always so kind and caring! I’m greeted with smiles and they always know my name 🙂 Couldn’t ask for better care anywhere else! Coupled with two, highly recommended and educated dentists, you couldn’t ask, (or get!) better dental care than at Sanford Dental Excellence! I am so appreciative for all that they do for me!

Lauren Clauss

★★★★★

Just finished an 8 month process to have Mini dental implants on my upper teeth, I am so glad that I chose Sanford Dental Excellence to do the job. Dr Seidler and his staff made the procedure a very pleasant experience. They were always caring and very professional. Brandi and Christina were outstanding.The best dental office I have ever been to. If you are planning this procedure or other dental work this is the place to go. For what they did I thought the price was very reasonable. Dr Seidler should be proud of the team he has put together at Sanford Dental Excellence. A big "Thank you" to Dr Seidler and his staff!

James Bateman

★★★★★

Words cannot adequately express my gratitude for the exceptional service I have received from Sanford Dental Excellence. I can now smile with confidence. The caring attitudes of Dr. Mitrogogos and his staff made the experience one I would recommend to anyone without reservation. My personal story has been one of hardship and I have seen the hand of God moving through the great people in this facility according to Joel 2:25-26, which says "I will restore or replace for you the years that the locust has eaten, and you shall eat in plenty and be satisfied and praise the name of the Lord your God, who has dealt wonderously with you. And my people shall never be put to shame." Thank you all again for making this possible!

Diane Roberts

★★★★★

My husband and I have been going to Sanford Dental Excellence for about 8 years. We have both had extensive work done including implants, veneers, dentures, crowns - bridges, you name it. It's so nice to know that whatever you have done there will be done correctly - and will last as it should. Not to mention it's some of the most painless dentistry that I've every experienced. Highly recommended. I would never go anywhere else. Dr. Seidler, Dr. Mitrogogos and the entire staff are top notch. We love them.

Charlotte Elswick

★★★★★

Recently finished very long and tedious dental work with Dr. George M. and his staff. The result is a beautiful smile I could never have imagined. Everyone was so professional and kind and I still don’t know what to say except they are an exceptional team and I was so fortunate To have found them. My sincere appreciation to everyone there...thank you.

Dee Mcshea

★★★★★

Sanford Dental Excellence are by far the best dental providers in the area. All their staff are personable, professional and technically excellent at what they do. I also love the time they take to fully explain the procedures and work with you to keep costs manageable. Keep up the great work!

Laura Casey

★★★★★

I had a really bad experience with another Dentist so I was researching to find the best Dentist that would do what I needed, and really care about how I look and feel. Dr. Seidler was awesome and did a wonderful job with no pain and a great deal of attention to appearance. I would absolutely recommend to family or friends to check out Sanford Dental Excellence, the office and all in it are fantastic!!!

Susan Bressler

★★★★★

I have been going to this office for 19 years! The staff are excellent AND friendly! They always take the time to make sure I understand every procedure. Their work is outstanding and I love the sedation option! I wouldn't go anywhere else.. even if I move! Thank you so much for all you do!

Maria Nicholson

★★★★★

I have been a patient of Sanford Dental Excellence for a few years now and I absolutely love this office! The entire staff is super friendly and welcoming. I always feel at home when I come here. Thanks guys and keep up the great work (: <3

Tayla Vaughan

★★★★★

I am new to Sanford Dental but my original consultation, as well as my next visit, was as thorough and professional as I have ever had. Dr. Seidler, and his staff, are fantastic. They are very knowledgeable and caring. They have made me feel extremely comfortable. I normally dislike dentists but I am actually looking forward to my next visit.

Richard Bonnie

★★★★★

I recommend Sanford Dental all the time! They are the best you will love them as much as I do and I am sure other do as well! The changed my life and gave me confidence again!

Donna Siva

★★★★★

I finally found a dentist I love! The staff is friendly and very efficient. Cleanings and procedures are painless. Dr. Mitrogogos is wonderful. We have sent many people to this office and all are pleased. Highly recommend!

Mindi W.

★★★★★

5 Stars and I would give more if they were available. I have likewise posted my sincere feelings about this practice on YELP! I am totally happy with the performance of each employee at Sanford Dental Excellence.....they are a super team who, no doubt, love their job and have shown the utmost respect for my wife and me. The Dr. and his staff and certainly earned our respect and loyalty. Did I say we are happy with the service? YOU BETCHA!

J.B. C.

★★★★★

I have been going here since 1987 and have had major and minor work done. These physicians are top notch and the office staff is superb. My experiences have been nothing but stellar for every visit I have ever had. They accommodate me and they care about me and they work to make everything as painless as possible. The best dentists and dental staff around!!

Karen M.

★★★★★

I am very pleased with your practice. The kindness and compassion shown me during my appointment yesterday were outstanding and I do tell my friends about the practice.

Barbara M.

★★★★★

So happy that I found this practice. The very best staff ever. Looking forward to future visits. Thank you !!!!

Judy J.

★★★★★

I've been going to SDE for over 5 years now, and they've always been great! I've never been a big fan of the dentist, but whenever I go, they make me as comfortable as possible, no matter what the procedure. My husband and I moved two hours from Sanford, and I still make the drive for my appointments because it's worth it!

Betsy H.

★★★★★

Love the staff...Jen and Jamie at the front desk...awesome! Had my next appt card ready before my cleaning was even done! Noel is on top of her game with my cleanings...in and out on my lunch hour with time to grab a bite!!!

Susan R.

★★★★★

Everyone here is great and very friendly. The Dentist is very kind and knowledgeable as well . I would recommend sanford dental excellence to anyone.

Sam S.

★★★★★

Everything they advertised it to be. Professional, timely, caring, promises kept, reassuring, sensitive . . . I could go on and on. I would certainly refer my family to this practice. I can't give it a higher recommendation than that.

Bruce K.

★★★★★

It is always such a pleasant experience whenever I visit. The staff is so prompt and always friendly. They answer any question or concern you have. I LOVE my hygienist, Noel!! She is so thorough and really just the best! I've been a loyal patient for more than 20 years and I couldn't be happier!!

Leslie H.

★★★★★

The staff members are so compassionate and friendly. Makes going to the dentist a pleasant experience. I highly recommend Sanford Dental Excellence.

Suzanne E.

★★★★★

I had my regular cleaning appointment with Ashley. I was taken on time and out in less than 45 minutes. Ashley does an excellent job and does not scold me for not being a good flosser! I leave with my teeth whiter and cleaner, feeling nice and smooth. The atmosphere in the office is friendly and welcoming. I highly recommend this dental practice. Thank you.

Debra D.

★★★★★

A great team. I was in and out quickly, no pain, friendly staff. Highly recommend.

Mike O.

★★★★★

Professional, friendly staff in an immaculate environment. Dr. Seidler has a wonderful bedside manner and his staff is top-notch. Highly recommend this practice.

Rebecca L.

★★★★★

If you've had a bad dental experience and are afraid like I am, THIS IS THE PLACE TO BE!! I wouldn't change a thing about my experience. The entire staff is so kind and gentle, I will never go to another dentist. They deserve 6 stars! Their equipment is top knotch and the office is beautiful 🙂

Krissy G.

★★★★★

Everyone at Sanford Dental were pleasant,professional and made me feel as comfortable as possible. I would recommend Sanford Dental to anyone looking for a dentist....You all are the best...

Betty B.

★★★★★

My family and I have been going to Sanford Dental Excellence and Dr. Seidler for 4 years. I couldn't be happier with the professional and friendly staff, and personal touch I haven't seen anywhere else. I couldn't recommend this office enough to anyone looking for a new dentist.

Justin C.

★★★★★

I am very happy with Dr. Seidler and the entire practice. The hygienists are thorough, the doctor's work is exacting, and I actually have a good feeling every time I leave the office. Plus, I actually do feel more inclined to smile. How's that for really liking a dental operation!

Jane E.

★★★★★

They are all amazing people and really do care about their patients. I love how they remember your name so quickly and are so friendly. They make you feel comfortable to be yourself and not to mention the smiles are addictive 😁

Arya T.

★★★★★

Today was my second visit to Sanford Dental Excellence. All the staff is very nice and the doctors are awesome. I highly recommend checking this place out. You won't be disappointed!!

Lorna W.

Schedule Your Complimentary Implant Consultation and 3D Bone Scan Today

Call Now
